45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah reported that a person from the emigrants struck the back of an Ansari. He came to Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) and asked for compensation. Thereupon Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) said:Leave it. for it is something disgusting. Ibn Mansur said that in the narration transmitted on the authority of Amr (these words are also found):" I heard Jabir

chapter.ara-name: باب نَصْرِ الأَخِ ظَالِمًا أَوْ مَظْلُومًا
chapter.eng-name: Supporting One's Brother Whether He Is Doing Wrong Or Being Wronged
